name: Kenopsia
description:
The door shuts behind you and the sound rings eerily throughout the office. Wasn’t this place bustling with activity just a few minutes ago? What happened to everyone?... And what was that in the corner of your eye?

Explore a surreal office… and more!

Follow Amelia, a stressed and overworked gamedev (or as people in the industry call it... Just a gamedev) through a surreal trip with three distinctly different game modes:
  • A first person adventure game in a strange 3D office environment,
    *A challenging 2,5D platforming game, and
    *A 2D top-down fantasy gathering-brawler.
Each of the modes depict the games narrative in different ways, from fully voiceacted narration and conversation, text-based dialouges, to pure ludo-narrative. Each a part in telling the story of Amelia.

Who are Team Cwab?


Team Cwab is a group of 13 developers who came together at Futuregames Academy to create an ambitious and creative experience over 6 months.
Just like the mighty crab we are hardy yet respectful, dedicated and hardworking but with a playful sense of humor and a soft and caring heart within. Plus, we both go great with tartar sauce.
